page.title: 07Sunday in Street
page.content: Sunday is a special day,a resting day,a fun day.The shops are closed. Most people do not go to work and families get together. Sundays are spent in different ways. In the mornings a few dads and mums go to work,or to church.Some dads garden or clean the car but many read the Sunday papers,often in bed.Most mums spend the morning cooking or working in the house or garden. A few children go to Sunday school at the{Methodist Church,}the{Baptist {Chapel,}the tin church{(C of E)}or the {Salvation Army,}but most play outside or watch T.V. One or two families go out for the day,to the beach,to visit relatives or to sporting events.Many visit the pub at lunch time and return home for a special family meal. Afternoons and evenings are spent walking, visiting or watching T.V.
